exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros. unfold is_finite, Inf_fct. destruct (Req_EM_T a b); intros. - subst. apply Finite. - apply Glb_Rbar_correct. intros y [x [H1 H2]]. specialize (H x). assert (Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b) by lra. specialize (H H3). apply Rle_trans with (f x). + apply Inf_fct_le. auto. + apply H.
